page.title: 17A day in Amy's Life
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and have corn- flakes and a cup of tea. Before school I go out and feed the lambs. There are four of them - one ram, one mule and two ewes. We give them warm powdered milk from a baby's bottle. Then we go to school. In assembly we are talking about animals. After that we do Maths or English in groups before we go out to play. I am in Group 2 and after play we swap over. Then we have dinner. I have a packed lunch so I usually finish before din- ner people. On Tuesday afternoons we do craft (I do patchwork) followed by reading and story before we go home. After School I go for a ballet lesson. On other nights I am involved in country dancing and Brownies.
